name: Ping Pong Pig
description:
People say pigs don't fly, but hey, here they really do!


Once in a Dream land where pigs can fly, a hard day came when angry hammers started to steal all the money from Dream land people, fly the Piggy bank while helping to save as much golden coins as you can!

Avoid the angry hammers, they can smash the flying pig and take the money you have saved!

Dream land is full of challenges you can accomplish, compete with your friends and other people around the world and see who is better!

Save the Dream land! Be fast and focused while collecting tons of golden coins and don't let the angry hammers to touch flying Piggy bank!

How far can you make it?

WARNING: THIS PING PONG TYPE GAME IS SUPER ADDICTING AND FUN!
